creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: ten total lines; every other line is full-length, alternating with one-character lines; last two lines are longer, including signature; long rectangular relief stamp URC; square intaglio stamp LLC; square relief stamp LLC; mounted on jet black board
markings: long rectangular relief stamp URC; square intaglio stamp LLC; square relief stamp LRC; on back of mount, bottom center, in pencil: [Togai]
title: Poem
